descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties is proudly offering this gorgeous modern 4-bedroom townhouse located in Grand Views community, Meydan. title_advert: ['Corner unit ground floor below market price']
location1: ['UrbanaDubai, Dubai South (Dubai World Central), EMAAR South']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nMaids Room']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are delighted to be able to offer this three bedroom ground floor corner unit in Urbana 1, Emaar South.
With handover due very soon, this property offers amazing value for an end user or an investor alike.  Being located in Emaar South, the location is very convenient for not only Dubai World Central airport but also the Expo 2020 site. Furthermore, the location is perfect for those people needing to commute to Abu Dhabi yet retaining a Dubai residency and lifestyle.
The properties in Urbana are unique to this development and the first of its kind in Dubai.  They are stacked town homes meaning that they are like apartments however they are only on two floors.  There are many benefits to this including lower service fees and also the community has the lifestyle of a conventional villa community with pool and parks.
The accommodation comprises an entrance foyer, spacious living room/dining room/open kitchen, the master bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, two further bedrooms and a shared family bathroom.
Outside there is a good space with an area of garden to the rear of the property and covered parking to the front.  This property has the unique benefit of enjoying a corner plot which gives much more privacy than a normal type of location.
Please call Martin +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae for further information.']

descriptions: ['Description1 Bedroom ApartmentStunning Marina View\xa0Vacant on TransferClosed proximity to Jumeirah Open BeachEasy access to Marina View.The Point occupies a prestigious position directly overlooking the iconic Dubai Marina Yacht Club. The outstanding facilities include secure parking, contemporary fitted kitchens, a spacious lobby, a childrens play area and a barbecue deck. 24-hour security, concierge and housekeeping services are also provided.It is indeed perfectly situated between the Jumeirah Beach and Dubai Marina in which a number of branded hotels and restaurants have been operating so far.Dubai Marina:\xa0This exclusive waterfront community is situated advantageously near Interchange 5 of Sheikh Zayed Road, close to the popular landmarks of Dubai, and offers a rewarding waterfront living with unobstructed views across the marina as the majority of the properties line the waterfront.']
